segments.text: What ’ s wrong with you , Mr . Polly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong ? I want a break from this horrible job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , buy a bottle of soft drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to buy a bottle for me in the shop ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a problem , because my boss is in that shop now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will go there myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn ’ t matter . Oh , God , I have only four dollars in my wallet . Is that possible for me to buy one ?
segments.speaker: S2
